Pra quem gosta, adrenalina pura! Jogo excelente!!

I will say after playing this game since first 3 killers and stop playing it for some time, I can say that this game has nothing to offer to killers meaning that you have to be less skilled as a survivor to outplay the killer. 

Builds are no longer relevant, regardless of what you do. The only way you can play this game is to master The Blight and Pyramid head that are mobile and counter the pallets or ignore obstacles, respectively. This game is getting worse and worse every time they update it. There is LITERALLY no point in updating the killers as the perks they have are useless. If you face a good survivor, 2 gens will be done by the time you will do a single hit. Survivor's marks are getting harder to read, no response to toxic behaviour apart from ragequitting and punishment for being banned from games for 4 minutes 1st leave and 30 minutes 2nd leave. 

I am sorry, I am deleting this game. Thanks devs for being one-sided when it comes to balance. You managed to kill a solid game.

В целом игра хорошая, имеет как "плюсы", так и "минусы".
Начнём с плюсов: 
1. Игра для хорошего провождения времени с 5ю друзьями по их крики)
2. Довольно интересно играть против маньяка (приловчиться читать его или же понимать карты)
3. Довольно часто обновления, которые приносят в игру: новых маньяков/выживших, новые таланты и тп.
4. Играть за прокаченного маньяка, которого ты мейнил - оказывает приятный кайф от киллстрика4.
5. Балансный донат)
Минусы: 
1. Недоработанный подбор матчей (пример: ты "бронза 3", а тебя может кинуть против или с "радужным 4").
2. Настройки графики = одна кнопка, то есть нельзя более хорошо разобраться в них, так же текстурки "низкого" качества не особо сильно отличаются от "ультра".
3. Донат хоть и балансный, но всё же его слишком много (ну, то есть, ты точно не купишь всех маняков играя "Free to Play")
На этом мой взгляд на игру на данный момент закончен, но как по мне игра стоит того, играю с удовольствием и продолжу играть)
it's not the same game I fell in love with.

In the current state of the game you could really play only survivor and have fun. Playing killer with the sbmm is a living hell because the mmr system is so broken, at this point that you rarely get other players on your level, in my case I only get players from red ranks that have over a thousand hours of play time or new players with less than 10 hours of playtime. Still would recommend tho cause there's still some enjoyment found in playing the game even though it's rare.

I'm super late to the party with this game, but I've been unable to put it down for about a month now. I really enjoy playing survivor with my friends, as well as solo-queueing as a killer. I've never seen asymmetrical horror done as well as DBD does it, and I highly recommend.

one of the greatest game I have played so far, being a killer or survivor is so fun (will its kinda stress sometimes for killer) but overall its easy to learn and having fun time plus some laugh or screaming moments with your friends or even matching with good normal people, some are toxic yes but it doesn't affect the beauty of this game! I recommend it to everyone new who are possibly thinking buy it or not! its not that horror (after you spent more than 200 hours at least) but you will get fun chases, doing gens with others, helping and sometimes you need to move on ..!
fun game if not a little unballanced

After many hours of playing this game, I can say it gets better the more you play. It is fun to play custom games with friends, but matchmaking has quite a lot of toxic players so be careful of that. The better you are at the game, the easier it becomes to get away from the killer, but it does require a lot of practice and you need to be willing to put in the time to unlock the perks you need to be the best you can be.

Dead by Daylight is a great game, but it has a steep learning curve and the toxic community does not make it any easier to learn the game.

The current state of the game makes it hard to recommend this game to others. There's a huge influx of hackers/cheaters that can completely ruin a match by their existence. There's a current issue where people can get your IP from DBD and use it to DDoS you. Neither of these issues have even been addressed by the devs and the report system doesnt do well either. Fog whispers are supposed to help but all you here from them is I dunno if i wil get removed as a fog whisper for speaking my mind.
Ive made it too high mmr with killer. SWF's all day and tbagging at the gate. No real gen regression on killers to slow down the gen rushing swf's. Not to mention the fast as gen pops and fast heals that seem really sus............ dead hard roll backs, shadow nerfs on certain perks on killers. The game is fun if you can handle the stress of all said above. You cant make mistakes but the Survior can make a 100 mistakes and hold shift W. Ohh and NOED

Ive made it to Survivor Gold 1. Never really liked playing survivor.... looping is crazy fun but once you drop that "GOD" pallet your fucked on that loop. The lack of being able to communicate with teammates makes it hard to solo survivor. They do have a lot of meta perks that make the killers have to tunnel or camp or even face camp. Dead hard, DS, unbreakable. Now we got boon perks for even more fast healing and being able to pick your self after you mess up.
игра отстой но тут есть Майкл Маерс

あくまで自分自身の意見なので真に受けないで下さい。
結論から言うとおすすめできるかって言うと真ん中ぐらいです。

～理由～

キラー目線の場合

★良い所★
・サバを倒したときのストレス発散
・立ち回りを駆使しキマったときの嬉しさ。
・心理戦や先読みで倒せたときの嬉しさ。

★悪い所★
・煽りPTにあたり萎えてしまう人が多い。
・環境が変わる毎に極端な有利不利がサバキラー共に発生しがち。
・初心者の方だと最初はキラーはキツイと思います。マッチ成立があまり良くないため。

サバイバー

★良い所★
・キラーから逃げているときのドキドキ感が楽しい。
・キラーとチェイス(逃げ回っているとき)に最後までうまく逃げ切れたときの嬉しさ。
・仲間と上手く連携し誰も死なずに脱出できたときの達成感が良い。

★悪い所★
・野良さんと逃げるときはあまり楽しくない。皆で話しながら逃げるほうが数倍楽しい。なので一人ではおすすめしない。
・マッチ成立があまり良くないときが多少ある。
・デッドハードと言うパークで手こずる事が多い。
・板判定やキラーからの攻撃判定が明らかおかしい時がある。

以上です。
自分はこのゲームを初めてPCでインストールしたゲームですが今でも楽しく遊べておりフレンドが１５０人も出来て凄くいい思い出となりました！！
煽りは正直絶対に消えることはないと思います。
誰でもキラーをすると一回は必ず遭遇します。
挫けずにそこは頑張って欲しいです。
なので最初はキラーで公開マッチに行く前にフレンドさんと一度カスタム部屋で練習することをおすすめします！！

あまりいいレビューではないかもしれませんが
参考になればと思い投稿しました。
ตอนกลางคืนหาห้องนานชิปเป๋ง

I love horror films/video-games so DBD has a special place in my heart <3 Although the constant bugs are very annoying/concerning, I'm hoping this company will soon realize they need to take some serious time off releasing content/cosmetics and just fix everything (I do realize that these are 2 different departments btw so please no hate T_T) The original killer concepts are honestly amazing, I don't think there' a single killer in the game I would say is lackluster/bad. My only negative feedback aside from game-breaking bugs (lol) is with how many perks there are in the game, I wish there wasn't 3 tiers to each perk because it's extremely expensive to get all these perks on 1 killer/survivor... Either get rid of tiers, award more blood-points either after each match or have WAY MORE blood-point events, or make the blood-web WAY cheaper because the way it's set-up now, it makes it very difficult to try new builds on survivors/killers. Also, with the overwhelming amount of offerings that we get it would be nice if there was some sort of system that would allow us to re-roll/sell back offerings that we don't use!!!
I recommend this game if you have a serial killer kink and also want to suffer! bhvr always keep it interesting with new bugs everytime they update! 10/10 i wanna f*ck pyramid head ☺♥
